txt.en: 'Here in S청ri-kyl채, you will find more civilized manners than you would find among those living in the wilderness.'
'I am proud to be Lumi-v채ki, for we are a strong and courageous people.'
'Our craftsmen are some of the finest in the world...it cannot be any other way.'
'I am worried about the Susi-v채ki threatening our people.'
'This is the Iso-talo, where we discuss matters of importance...things of which I am sure you would have no interest.'
